attrs.name: modelValue / v-model
attrs.desc: Set the initial value of the calendar component. ;Bound Value

attrs.name: disabled
attrs.desc: Disabled
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: popper-append-to-body
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to insert a pop-up box to the body element. When a fault occurs in the dialog box that is displayed, you can set this attribute to false (for details, see the select component).
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: readonly
attrs.desc: Set whether the calendar component is read-only.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: editable
attrs.desc: The text box can be entered.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: clearable
attrs.desc: Display Clear Button
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: size
attrs.desc: Text box size; The values of this attribute are medium, small, and mini

attrs.name: placeholder
attrs.desc: Placeholder content for non-range selection
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is []

attrs.name: start-placeholder
attrs.desc: Placeholder of the start date when the range is selected

attrs.name: end-placeholder
attrs.desc: Placeholder of the end date when the range is selected

attrs.name: type
attrs.desc: Display type; The optional value of this attribute is year / month / dates / week / daterange / date / datetime / datetimerange / monthrange
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is date.

attrs.name: format
attrs.desc: Display format in the text box
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is yyyy-MM-dd.

attrs.name: value-format
attrs.desc: Specifies the format of the binding value. If this parameter is not specified, the binding value is Date
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is the Date object.

attrs.name: time-format
attrs.desc: If the user-defined format cannot automatically distinguish the time and date, you can set this parameter to assist in determining the format.

attrs.name: isutc8
attrs.desc: The default value is false. If this parameter is set to true, the time in GMT+8 is still displayed when the default time zone is switched. Applicable scenario: The GMT+8 time is displayed in regions outside China

attrs.name: align
attrs.desc: Alignment mode; The optional values of this attribute are left / center / right
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is left.

attrs.name: show-timezone
attrs.desc: Whether to enable the time zone selection function on the date selection panel
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: popper-class
attrs.desc: Class name added to the DatePicker drop-down list box

attrs.name: picker-options
attrs.desc: The following table lists the options of the current time and date selector.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is {}.

attrs.name: range-separator
attrs.desc: Separator for selecting a range
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is -.

attrs.name: default-value
attrs.desc: Optional. When the selected date is empty, the time displayed by default when the selector panel is opened. Set it to a value that can be parsed by new Date().

attrs.name: default-time
attrs.desc: The specific time of the current day used by the selected date during range selection; The optional value of this attribute is see date format

attrs.name: name
attrs.desc: Native attribute

attrs.name: unlink-panels
attrs.desc: Cancel the linkage between two date panels in the range selector.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: suffix-icon
attrs.desc: Custom selector's rear icon
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this property is IconCalendar.

attrs.name: clear-icon
attrs.desc: Custom Clear Icon
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is IconOperationfailed.

attrs.name: time-arrow-control
attrs.desc: Use the arrow button to select the time. This parameter is used when type is set to datetime or datetimerange. By default, the time is selected by scrolling the mouse wheel

attrs.name: validate-event
attrs.desc: Specifies whether the date selector triggers form validation during input. The default value is true.

events.name: change
events.desc: This event is triggered when the user confirms the selected value. change (arg1) {//arg1 is the changed date or date set of datepicker}

events.name: blur
focus
